-| diffsc(hs0, cfv(csigagen, c0))
-| diffsw(hs0, wcel(c0, ctop))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ Top →(Clsd ` c0)⊆(sigaGen ` c0))
⊣ d(hs0,(sigaGen ` c0))
⊣ d(hs0, c0 ∈ Top)

body.origin: |- diffsc(hs0, cfv(csigagen, c0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(cfv(ccld, c0), cfv(csigagen, c0)))
-| diffsw(hs0, wcel(c0, ctop))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ Top →(Clsd ` c0)⊆(sigaGen ` c0))
⊣ d(hs0, c0 ∈ Top)

body.origin: |- diffsw(hs0, wcel(c0, ctop))

cumulated.origin: |- wi(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(cfv(ccld, c0), cfv(csigagen, c0)))
cumulated.pretty: ⊢ (c0 ∈ Top →(Clsd ` c0)⊆(sigaGen ` c0))

comment: A Borel Algebra contains all closed sets of its base topology. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 27-Mar-2017.)
